title: Mixed Reality (MR)-Based University Design Course Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Design Principles and 3D Modeling
context.additional_context: A comparative learning environment combining practical training with digital devices (e.g., HoloLens 2 MR equipment) and traditional textbooks/tools.

learning_goals: Learners improve spatial analysis capabilities of geometric structures by over 4.36 points using MR technology
Learners enhance creative design solution generation capabilities by over 1.59 points in a mixed reality environment
Learners improve 3D model visualization and spatial implementation capabilities by over 3.08 points compared to traditional methods
Learners develop the competency to comparatively solve real-world industrial problems using MR and traditional methods through PBL approaches
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
